Actions.Name: Excel
Actions.Description: The Steam Wright revs the Steam Hammer, granting it +1 boon, bonus damage, and increasing its range and blast radius by 1 for the rest of combat. This effect stacks twice.

Actions.Name: Steam Blast
Actions.AreaEffect: [fray] damage and inflict burning. Burning characters must save or become blinded. Burning and blinded characters take [fray] damage twice instead.
